nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_1018_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Now that I am retired, I find I am spending more and more time on charity work, which I am very happy to take part in.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_1026_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The lawyer said to the old man: "If you die before you have made a will, the law will decide the distribution of your property, which may not be in accordance with your wishes."
